comments.content:
Why do you post the same request again?  
You can continue the discussion on your old thread here:  
 [http://typophile.com/node/117508](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414231956/http:/typophile.com/node/117508 "http://typophile.com/node/117508")

He probably couldn’t find the old thread any more, created a new one (11:23 PM), then suddenly found the new one, thanked Ryuk there (11:27 PM) and didn’t know how to delete the new thread. Quite understandable, given that Font ID threads don’t show up in the [list of one’s own posts](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414231956/http:/typophile.com/user/me/track) for some reason.
yup haha thanks ! it should show up in My Posts for us to track it..
